author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: @Willy I expect that will be an urban location whereas some places in rural areas which never got connected to the grid will have skipped that part of progress and gone straight to renewable energy with their own turbines.

author: Willy
content: Somme day in the futurer I can see it being news that what ever location will be newsworthy for being one of the last places to finally accept renewable energy
